tasks.task: Operating a small combine harvester for harvesting rice and wheat
subtasks: Sitting in the operator's seat to start the combine harvester
Adjusting the combine harvester's speed and direction using controls
Engaging the vibrating screen to clean the harvested grain
Monitoring the combine harvester's progress and making adjustments as needed
Ensuring the combine harvester is properly maintained and serviced

tasks.task: Unloading harvested grain from the combine harvester
subtasks: Detaching the grain tank or hopper from the combine harvester
Transporting the grain tank or hopper to a storage location
Emptying the grain tank or hopper into a larger storage bin or container
Cleaning the grain tank or hopper after unloading

tasks.task: Managing lodging crops with the combine harvester
subtasks: Adjusting the combine harvester's cutting depth and overall height
Operating the combine harvester in rugged terrain to access lodging crops
Ensuring proper engagement of the vibrating screen for inefficiently harvested crops
Monitoring for any equipment failures in rough operating conditions
